Name: MEG-BIDS Brainstorm data sample
HowToAcknowledge:
If you reference this dataset in your publications, please aknowledge its authors and cite Brainstorm as indicated on the website (http://neuroimage.usc.edu/brainstorm/CiteBrainstorm). 

Also, include the following message: ' This data was obtained from the OpenNeuro database. Its accession number is ds000246'
